readable.content: a little baby standing in front of a colorful merry-go-round A little boy is watching a merry-go-round . A little boy watches a Ferris Wheel in motion . A tow-headed boy looks on at the children 's merry-go-round . Small child looking at a colorful children 's amuseument ride .
